name: TRENCH FIGHTERS
textLong: Use this Stratagem in the Fight phase, when a DEATH GUARD PLAGUE MARINES unit from your army is selected to fight. Until the end of the phase, each time a model in that unit fights, if it is equipped with any plague knives, it makes 1 additional attack with one of its plague knives.

name: Strat Name
targetEnemy: Enemy unit in combat range of targetOwn
textLong: This strat does this in a cool way
